description: Professionals who extract insights from data, build predictive models, and enable data-driven decision making

career_levels.title: Data Analyst
key_responsibilities: Create reports and dashboards for business stakeholders
Perform ad-hoc data analysis to answer business questions
Clean and prepare data for analysis
Conduct basic statistical analysis
Document findings and present to teams
nice_to_have: Experience with analytics tools (Google Analytics, Mixpanel)

career_levels.title: Senior Data Analyst
key_responsibilities: Lead complex analytical projects end-to-end
Design experiments and analyze A/B tests
Build automated reporting systems
Partner with product/business teams on strategy
Mentor junior analysts
Translate business problems into analytical frameworks
required_skills: Experience with ETL and data pipelines
nice_to_have: Experience with cloud data platforms (Snowflake, BigQuery, Redshift)
dbt or similar data transformation tools
career_levels.promotion_criteria: Demonstrates analytical rigor, drives business impact through insights, strong collaboration

career_levels.title: Data Scientist
key_responsibilities: Build predictive models and machine learning solutions
Design and analyze experiments
Develop data products and algorithms
Collaborate with engineering to deploy models
Communicate complex findings to non-technical audiences
Mentor analysts and junior data scientists
required_skills: Experience with ML libraries (scikit-learn, TensorFlow, PyTorch)

career_levels.title: Senior Data Scientist
key_responsibilities: Lead high-impact ML projects
Define data science strategy for product areas
Build scalable ML systems in production
Influence product roadmap with data insights
Mentor data science team
Establish best practices for ML development
required_skills: Expert ML practitioner with production experience
Experience with MLOps and model deployment
Strategic thinking and business impact focus
career_levels.promotion_criteria: Drives measurable business value through ML, technical leadership, influences org direction

career_levels.title: Staff / Principal Data Scientist
key_responsibilities: Set data science strategy for organization
Solve most complex ML problems
Drive ML platform and infrastructure decisions
Represent data science in executive planning
Build data science culture and capabilities
Industry thought leadership and publications
required_skills: Track record of building ML systems at scale
career_levels.promotion_criteria: Company-wide impact, technical thought leadership, shapes organizational capabilities

adjacent_roles.transition_path: From Data Analyst/Scientist with interest in data infrastructure and pipelines
adjacent_roles.key_differences: Focus on building data systems vs analyzing data for insights

adjacent_roles.transition_path: From Data Scientist with strong engineering skills
adjacent_roles.key_differences: Focus on deploying and scaling ML systems vs research and modeling

adjacent_roles.transition_path: From Senior Data Analyst with engineering mindset
adjacent_roles.key_differences: Focus on data transformation and modeling vs end-user analysis

adjacent_roles.transition_path: From PhD-level Data Scientist interested in fundamental research
adjacent_roles.key_differences: Focus on advancing state-of-the-art vs applied business problems
